trans-unit.source: Album art, lyrics, and top ten similar artists for currently playing song.
trans-unit.target: 专辑艺术,歌词,以及当前播放歌曲的前十位类似艺术家。

trans-unit.source: Browsing of music library by folder structure.
trans-unit.target: 按文件夹结构浏览音乐库。

trans-unit.source: Completely Asynchronous interface, no refreshing needed.
trans-unit.target: 完全异步接口,无需刷新。

trans-unit.source: MPD WebAMP is a web client to control music playback on a media server PC
trans-unit.target: MPD WebAMP是一个网络客户端,用于控制媒体服务器PC上的音乐播放。

trans-unit.source: MPD WebAMP is an asynchronous web client for the Music Player Daemon
trans-unit.target: MPD WebAMP是音乐播放器守护进程的异步网络客户端。

trans-unit.source: Playback controls, volume, seek and live status display.
trans-unit.target: 播放控制、音量、寻找和实时状态显示。
播放列表的操作、保存和加载。

trans-unit.source: Search by file name or search by tags.
trans-unit.target: 按文件名搜索或按标签搜索。

trans-unit.source: Sessions: resume from where you left off.
trans-unit.target: 会议:从原来的地方恢复。

trans-unit.source: Themes: supports theming, default theme comes in four colors.
trans-unit.target: 主题:支持主题化,默认主题有四种颜色。

trans-unit.source: This release contains small bugfixes to loading playlist changes and displaying last.fm simlar artists info.
trans-unit.target: 这个版本包含了加载播放列表变化和显示last.fm simlar艺术家信息的小bug修正。

trans-unit.source: from a web browser. The program is based on TurboGears and uses it’s own web server to interface with the Music Player Daemon, a system service available on GNU/Linux PCs. MPD WebAMP provides the features and interface of a desktop application in a web based format.
trans-unit.target: 从网络浏览器。该程序基于TurboGears，并使用其自己的Web服务器与Music Player Daemon进行交互，Music Player守护程序是GNU / Linux PC上可用的系统服务。 MPD WebAMP以基于Web的格式提供桌面应用程序的功能和界面。
